channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16103] LLAP: Scheduler timeout monitor never stops with slot nodes
item.description: The scheduler timeout monitor is started when node count becomes 0 and stopped when node count becomes 1. For node count, we were relying on the paths under llap namespace. With addition of slot znodes, every node creates 2 paths (worker and slot). As a result, the size of the instances cache will never be 1 (always multiple of 2) which leads to condition where timeout monitor is not stopped.
item.summary: LLAP: Scheduler timeout monitor never stops with slot nodes

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: sseth could you please take a look?
Tested this patch on a cluster and timeout monitor is being stopped correctly.
Nit: the ref could be final and created in init. Other than that +1
